A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Worst Star Wars film ever. I'd rather watch the prequels back to back for a week than endure another sitting of this.
Dialogue - terrible
New characters - terrible
Humour - the theatre was full and no one was laughing
Plot - terrible
Abuse of established characters? - Horrific!
Disney destroying this once great franchise. George Lucas how I miss you.
